item.title: Beads Actually is introducing a special merlion bead in celebration of SG50, available for a limited time only
item.description: The Singaporean store Beads Actually is offering pre-orders for a merlion bead from OHM Beads. The merlion, a creature with a lion’s head and a fish’s body and tail, is a well-known symbol of Singapore. Only two hundred of these beads are available, exclusively through Beads Actually from July 2nd to July 31st. Following this period, it will be available for individual purchase globally. The bead, priced at S$110, is included in a starter kit featuring either a plain bangle or a snap-clasp bracelet.
